articles.title: Americans See India in Positive Light, but Few Have Confidence in Modi: Pew Research Survey - The Wire
articles.description: For those who have heard of Modi, “the prevailing sentiment is negative: 37% have little or no confidence in his ability to do the right thing regarding world affairs, compared with 21% who are confident in him”, according to the survey.
articles.content: New Delhi:As Prime Minister Narendra Modi makes an official state visit to the United States, Pew Research Center has put out more details of a survey it undertook between March 20 to 26, to gauge Am… [+2167 chars]

articles.author: Pia Krishnankutty
articles.title: From unusual state dinner with Obama to ‘Howdy, Modi!’ — a look at Modi’s past 7 US visits - ThePrint
articles.description: Modi's first visit to US as PM was in 2014 when he issued joint statement with then president Obama & addressed Indian-Americans at Madison Square Garden in New York.
articles.content: New Delhi: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived in the US Wednesday on what many expect will be a historical visit that may result in a myriad of deals and announcements between the two countries in … [+8680 chars]
